I usually don’t buy clothes online but I needed a black dress for a special occasion and thought with free returns I can’t go wrong. When I first tried it on I was surprised at the quality and how well it fit. I got so many compliments on this little dress while out and about. I got a small I am 5’5, 130, DD bust. This dress is not a tight fit, it’s not necessarily flowy either, kinda just lays over your curves nicely. This dress is not the type to “suck you in” however it’s flattering and comfortable and stylish. I didn’t wear a bra with it and still felt supported by the string that ties behind your neck. I ordered 5 dresses and out of them this is the one I chose and this is the one I loved the most from try on. Girlies didn’t believe me when I told them I got this on Amazon.

评论概述: Be careful if you have different sized chest and butt
评论详情: I thought this dress looked really cute on the model, but if you have a bust and butt that tend to be different sizes (think of if you're different sizes in bikini tops and bottoms) it won't look like that. I got a small to fit my chest, but then the dress ended up being very short and a bodycon like fit on me as opposed to the flowy skirt shown in the picture. (My measurements are 34B, 28W, 37H) If that's what you're looking for though this dress is ok. Decent quality, not sheer, and he sleeves are cute (but be careful if you have longer arms, they may be an awkward length). The chest does cinch with those cords so you can tie it tighter if needed which is nice. The dress is double lined sort of, with the opaque black overlaid with mesh like the sleeves, which I didn't realize from the picture. I'd also be careful if you have bigger or more muscular arms because the mesh sleeves don't stretch much.

评论概述: Mine came in a used return package
评论详情: Mine had the old shipping label from an Amazon return on the bag. They didn't even bother to re pack it. Cute dress, will wash and probably still keep. Bought on sale, full price probably wouldn't get again.

I recently purchased this little black dress in Large, being 5'7", and it's an absolute winner. The fit is snug yet comfortable, perfectly accentuating curves without being overly tight. The length is just right, hitting mid-thigh, which strikes a great balance between elegance and playfulness.  The dress's simple design is its strongest suit. Dressed up with heels and a clutch for a dinner, or down with sandals and a cardigan for brunch, it adapts effortlessly.  The fabric, a blend of polyester and spandex, feels durable and has maintained its shape and color after washing. It's lightweight and breathable, making it ideal for extended wear.  In terms of value, this dress is a great price. It's a timeless piece that I anticipate wearing frequently due to its style and comfort. If you're looking for that go-to little black dress that won't let you down, this is it. Highly recommended!
Got this dress as a last minute purchase for an event for my daughter and she looked stunning. The fit was perfect.
Wore this dress for my birthday!! Very comfortable, nice material, has lots of stretch, & it is NOT see through. I did wear shape wear underneath. Buy This dress NOW!
